Team Board Committees & Councils

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding=”9px||30px|||”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||1px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

BOARD

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”]

Our national board is comprised of community leaders and professionals with expertise in the legal field, leadership and management, healthcare, technology, brand & marketing, and more. Board members leverage their skills and networks to assist Family Promise in setting its strategic direction, developing new initiatives, to serve more families, more effectively, every year.
